word_mean: 烟草：茄科植物Nicotiana tabacum L.的干燥叶制剂，含各种生物碱，主要即烟碱，兼有镇静、麻醉与催吐、利尿作用，并有抑制心脏和解痉的作用

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Spanish tabaco; said to be from a Carib word denoting a tobacco pipe or from a Taino word for a primitive cigar, but perhaps from Arabic

entry.def: Tobacco is dried leaves which people smoke in pipes, cigars, and cigarettes. You can also refer to pipes, cigars, and cigarettes as a whole as tobacco .

example.ex: Try to do without tobacco and alcohol...
I believe it is time to ban tobacco advertising altogether.
example.tran: 我认为该完全禁止烟草广告了。

entry.def: Tobacco is the plant from which tobacco is obtained.

means.word_mean: 1. leaves of the tobacco plant dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion
2. aromatic annual or perennial herbs and shrubs

Sentence.sentence: Also, drink plenty of liquids and avoid tobacco and alcohol.
